attributes.action: prioritize people working with the public
attributes.additional_details: Because they are at high risk dealing in close proximity with the public
attributes.background: I want shop workers and all people working with the public to be priority on the Covid vaccination list.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prioritise Key Retail Workers, being offered the Covid Vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426

All key workers to be higher up the list for coronavirus vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564466
